description: Number of primitive (aperiodic) word structures of length n using a 3-ary alphabet.
comments: Permuting the alphabet will not change a word structure. Thus aabc and bbca have the same structure.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
formula: Sum mu(d)*A007051(n/d-1) where d|n and n>0.
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
